lead_paragraph: China's top graft buster followed up a series of inspections of elite sports training centers by reiterating its warning against corruption in the run-up to the Rio Olympics on Monday.

headline.print_headline: China Issues Corruption Warning After Training Center Visits
headline.main: China Issues Corruption Warning After Training Center Visits
